pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Linear and Logistic Regression and Survival Analysis // Make summary tables for descriptive statistics and select explanatory variables automatically in various regression models. Support linear models, generalized linear models and cox-proportional hazard models. Generate publication-ready tables summarizing result of regression analysis and plots. The tables and plots can be exported in "HTML", "pdf('LaTex')", "docx('MS Word')" and "pptx('MS Powerpoint')" documents.
